code: export const needsMultipleValues=operator=>operator==='in';export const needsNoValue=operator=>['any','none'].includes(operator);export const validateFilterValue=(operator,value,isMultiple)=>{if(needsNoValue(operator)){return true;}if(isMultiple){return Array.isArray(value)&&value.filter(v=>v.trim()!=='').length>0;}return typeof value==='string'&&value.trim()!=='';};
